parameters.query: SELECT * FROM exercices_comptables WHERE id = $1 AND tenant_id = $2 AND cloture = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_brouillon FROM ecritures_comptables WHERE exercice_id = $1 AND tenant_id = $2 AND statut = 'brouillon';

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(le.debit),0) as total_debit, COALESCE(SUM(le.credit),0) as total_credit, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN pc.classe = 7 THEN le.credit - le.debit ELSE 0 END),0) as total_produits, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN pc.classe = 6 THEN le.debit - le.credit ELSE 0 END),0) as total_charges FROM lignes_ecritures le JOIN ecritures_comptables e ON le.ecriture_id = e.id LEFT JOIN plan_comptable pc ON le.numero_compte = pc.numero_compte AND pc.tenant_id = e.tenant_id WHERE e.exercice_id = $1 AND e.tenant_id = $2 AND e.statut = 'validee';
UPDATE exercices_comptables SET cloture = true, date_cloture = NOW(), resultat_net = $1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $2 AND tenant_id = $3 RETURNING id, code, resultat_net;
